meta.description: Help me raise $3500 (€3000) for a journey to South Africa in 2027 with an organization that helps people in townships get a better future!

404.explanation: If you're sure this page should exist, you can always message me on +31 6 85550282. TIA!

donationPopup.description: Sign up to receive updates by email

donationPopup.donateText: Donate via iDeal QR-code or iDeal link (for the Netherlands) or PayPal
donationPopup.bankTransfer: Paying via bank transfer is also possible: NL53 RABO 0316 8722 02 att. Mart Zielman with subject: 'Donation SHIB South Africa 2027.'
